name: Gravitas (itch) (Kelly Ray J)
description:
Your hands are gravity. Hold grip to pull your bullets toward you and release. Keep the red from crossing the blue.

Only tested in PCVR with an Oculus Quest.

Plugins used: 

FMOD Studio / iTween / VFX Starter Pack

Music "Trumpet Voluntary" & "Valkyrie" licensed through We <3 Indies.
